contentList.content: Piercer

Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals piercing damage, you roll your damage dice twice and use the highest result. When you score a Critical Hit that deals piercing damage to a creature, you roll one additional damage die when determining the extra piercing damage the target takes.

Gift of the Chromatic Dragon

When you take Acid, Cold, Fire, Lighting, or Poison damage, once per Short Rest you can use your reaction to give yourself Resistance to that damage type until the start of your next turn.

You also learn the Chromatic Infusion action, and can use it once per Long Rest.
Gift of the Chromatic Dragon: Chromatic Infusion
You touch a weapon and infuse it with Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. For the next minute, the weapon deals additional damage of the chosen type.

Reactive Resistance

Gift of the Gem Dragon

Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

When you take damage from a creature within 3m of you, you can use your reaction to deal force damage and attempt to push the creature away.
Gift of the Gem Dragon: Telekinetic Reprisal
When you take damage from a creature within 3m of you, you can use your reaction to deal [1] force damage and attempt to push the creature away.
Gift of the Metallic Dragon

You learn the Cure Wounds spell, and can cast it without expending a spell slot once per Long Rest.

When you are hit by an Attack Roll, you can use your reaction to grant a bonus to your Armour Class equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
